review: I got this to replace my aging Roku HD. I was initially worried it would be slower but but it turns out the processor/gpu is slightly newer and it has twice the memory. I definitely have noticed an improvement in speed and fewer delays when changing menus or loading channels. What I like best is that it use the new radio frequency remote so you don't even need to aim it anymore. The remote is so much more responsive than the old infrared line-of-sight one. Best of all, it was snap to install. Plug it in the HDMI slot, plug in the included USB cord in the back of it, plug the other end into the TV (or the wall if your TV doesn't have a spare USB slot). Very happy with my purchase.
author: Eric
